attributes.action: There are no cuts in Domestic Abuse
attributes.additional_details:
A new proposed cut in funding, is going to affect services that fight everyday against Domestic Violence.

The Haven Wolverhampton is facing a proposed cut in funding on a large scale.
This cut is going to cause a ripple effect throughout The Haven, possibly closing much needed refuge's, cutting staff support for vulnerable women & children, education & training, housing & financial advice and most importantly a safe place to be free from fear, for women & children so they are free from Domestic Abuse.

If The Haven is cut it is going to have a detrimental effect, impacting on the much needed services for past, present and future service users.
